title: How to Get Strength on Pokémon Leaf Green

steps.title: Go to Fuchsia City and enter the Safari Zone.
steps.content: Go to Fuchsia City and enter the Safari Zone.

steps.title: Exit and visit the Safari Zone Warden's house.
steps.content: Exit and visit the Safari Zone Warden's house. Talk to him, he'll thank you for his teeth and give you Strength.

steps.title: Teach it to a Pokémon; now you can move the boulder in his house:
steps.content: Teach it to a Pokémon; now you can move the boulder in his house: you'll find a Rare Candy.
